Module gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core
Package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup

Class MarkupDataTypeProvider

java.lang.Object
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.AbstractDataTypeProvider
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupDataTypeProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDataTypeProvider
public final class MarkupDataTypeProvider extends AbstractDataTypeProvider
Provides for runtime discovery of built-in implementations of the markup Metaschema data types.
